landing.description: Real-time mining safety monitoring system with biometric sensors, gas detection and instant alerts

features.subtitle: Complete Safety Solution
features.description: Integrated system composed of smart helmet, mobile application and web platform for comprehensive monitoring of miners' safety

courses.title: System Components
courses.description: Three main elements working together to ensure mining safety

facts.title: System Specifications
facts.description: Technical specifications and performance metrics validated for mining operations

banner.title: Transforming Mining Safety
banner.description: Reduce accidents by up to 60% with our real-time monitoring technology

teaching.title: Specialized Training
teaching.title.description: Training programs for the proper use of the mining monitoring system and safety protocols

basic.title: Basic Helmet Operation
basic.description: Training for miners on the correct use of the smart helmet and reading basic alerts

advanced.title: Advanced Monitoring
advanced.description: Training for supervisors in monitoring multiple workers and emergency management

analysis.title: Data Analysis
analysis.description: Training for managers in report interpretation and predictive risk analysis

share.title: Monitor in Real Time
share.description: Continuous monitoring of biometric parameters and environmental conditions

inspire.title: Immediate Alerts
inspire.description: Instant notifications for toxic gases, falls and health anomalies

teach.title: Predictive Analysis
teach.description: Machine learning algorithms for early risk identification

option1.title: Initial Assessment
option1.description: We conduct an initial assessment of your personnel and mining operations to design a customized training program.

option2.title: Practical Training
option2.description: We implement practical sessions with real equipment in simulated conditions.

option3.title: Certification and Follow-up
option3.description: Upon completing the training, personnel receive official certification and access to reference materials.

section3.title: Train your team in mining safety
section3.description: Improve your operation's safety with specialized training programs in the use of the monitoring system.

HERO.TITLE: Comprehensive Mining
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Intelligent real-time monitoring system with advanced biometric technology, automatic toxic gas detection and immediate alerts for maximum safety.

COMPONENTS.TITLE: Architecture of
COMPONENTS.DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive solution combining intelligent hardware, mobile application and web platform to ensure maximum safety in critical mining operations

FEATURES.TITLE: Technology of
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Technological innovation specifically designed for high-risk mining environments with the highest safety standards

BENEFITS.TITLE: Transform the
BENEFITS.DESCRIPTION: Reduce accidents by up to 60% with our intelligent monitoring system. Guaranteed regulatory compliance.
BENEFITS.PROACTIVE_DESC: Predictive AI system that identifies risks before they occur
BENEFITS.RESPONSE_DESC: Alerts in less than 3 seconds with precise geolocation
BENEFITS.COMPLIANCE_DESC: Compliance with NOM-032-STPS and international regulations

TEAM.TITLE: Experts in
TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Professionals with over 15 years of experience in developing critical systems for high-risk industries

TECH.TITLE: Technologies of
TECH.DESCRIPTION: Robust infrastructure built with the best market tools to ensure 24/7 scalability and reliability

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Transform Your Operation's Safety?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Join over 100 mining companies that trust our system to protect their workers' lives

COMPONENT_ITEMS.HARDWARE_DESC: Specialized IoT devices with biometric sensors, gas detectors and satellite communication for extreme environments
COMPONENT_ITEMS.MOBILE_APP_DESC: Intuitive interface for supervisors with push alerts, real-time reports and emergency management from any location
COMPONENT_ITEMS.PLATFORM_DESC: Centralized dashboard with predictive analytics, automated reports and complete operational safety management

FEATURE_ITEMS.REAL_TIME_DESC: 24/7 continuous tracking of vital signs and environmental conditions with updates every 5 seconds
FEATURE_ITEMS.PREDICTIVE_AI_DESC: Machine learning algorithms that anticipate incidents with 92% accuracy before they occur
FEATURE_ITEMS.BIO_SENSORS_DESC: Wearable technology that monitors heart rate, body temperature and blood oxygen levels
FEATURE_ITEMS.GAS_DETECTION_DESC: Multi-parameter sensors for CO2, methane, hydrogen sulfide and other dangerous gases
FEATURE_ITEMS.SATELLITE_COM_DESC: Guaranteed connectivity in remote areas without cellular coverage through private satellite network
FEATURE_ITEMS.AUTOMATED_REPORTS_DESC: Automatic generation of NOM-032-STPS reports and real-time regulatory compliance
FEATURE_ITEMS.EMERGENCY_PROTOCOLS_DESC: Immediate activation of rescue procedures and communication with response teams
FEATURE_ITEMS.DATA_ANALYTICS_DESC: Business intelligence platform with customizable dashboards and safety trends

BENEFIT_ITEMS.REDUCE_ACCIDENTS_DESC: Proven 60% reduction in serious incidents through early risk detection
BENEFIT_ITEMS.OPERATIONAL_EFFICIENCY_DESC: Optimization of safety processes that increases productivity by 25%
BENEFIT_ITEMS.REGULATORY_COMPLIANCE_DESC: Guaranteed adherence to NOM-032-STPS, ISO 45001 and international regulations
BENEFIT_ITEMS.COST_REDUCTION_DESC: Average savings of $2.5M annually in insurance premiums and regulatory fines
BENEFIT_ITEMS.REAL_TIME_DECISIONS_DESC: Immediate information for critical decision-making during emergencies
BENEFIT_ITEMS.WORKER_CONFIDENCE_DESC: 45% improvement in staff satisfaction and retention due to increased safety perception
